channel.title: Guides on TOPS GUIDE
channel.description: Recent content in Guides on TOPS GUIDE

item.title: Change class
item.description:
Changing class has a real-time 6-month cooldown. Type this in chat:

.charsel

item.title: Increasing the number of claims
item.description:
by Kanonir

Subscribed to the developer’s Discord for ≥ 6 months and you lack claim slots.
Open a ticket on Discord.

Message template

Hello, dear TOPS server administration!
I’m requesting to be granted veteran status. My TOPS nickname: [Insert your nickname].
I have been an active member of the TOPS server for more than six months, since [Specify your approximate start date on the server, or exact if you remember].
I believe that my contribution and long-standing presence on the server make me eligible for veteran status.
I would especially like to ask @kavoker to review my application.
Thank you for your time and attention!

item.title: Making a chair
item.description:
by Sephal

Plain rules for a 16×16×16 voxel grid:

  • Seat height ≥ 8 voxels.
  • Width and depth = 1 voxel → stool.
  • For a chair use seat depth ≥ 2 and add a backrest.

One-block template

  1. Place a block. Enable 1/16 mode.
  2. Top of seat at Y=8.
  3. Seat thickness 2–3, depth ≥ 2.
  4. Corner legs 1–2 voxels.
  5. Backrest 1–2 voxels from the rear edge upward.

Recommendations

  • Keep 1-voxel edges.
  • Stool = no backrest, depth 1.
  • Need larger → two blocks wide.

item.title: Path to all plot points (spoilers)
item.description:
author Pepevog

Complete route via translocators to the main junction, then branches to the Archives, the new Biome, Nadia village, and Tobias Cave.

Copy commands in order and paste into the game chat.

Part 1 · To the main junction

/waypoint addati spiral 3967 110 14189 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 1/38
/waypoint addati spiral 9258 110 20163 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 2/38
/waypoint addati spiral 8363 110 26616 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 3/38
/waypoint addati spiral 6725 110 31653 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 4/38
/waypoint addati spiral 11605 110 38456 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 5/38
/waypoint addati spiral 17120 110 38187 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 6/38
/waypoint addati spiral 18055 110 42587 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 7/38
/waypoint addati spiral 24809 110 44907 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 8/38
/waypoint addati spiral 22485 110 47864 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 9/38
/waypoint addati spiral 17156 110 51311 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 10/38
/waypoint addati spiral 9944 110 56714 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 11/38
/waypoint addati spiral 7607 110 60542 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 12/38
/waypoint addati spiral 13293 110 66880 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 13/38
/waypoint addati spiral 16879 110 69548 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 14/38
/waypoint addati spiral 23042 110 71140 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 15/38
/waypoint addati spiral 22376 110 74391 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 16/38
/waypoint addati spiral 26032 110 79083 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 17/38
/waypoint addati spiral 23975 110 80624 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 18/38
/waypoint addati spiral 31445 110 83058 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 19/38
/waypoint addati spiral 30462 110 85992 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 20/38
/waypoint addati spiral 36406 110 85052 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 21/38
/waypoint addati spiral 43525 110 88342 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 22/38
/waypoint addati spiral 48296 110 87083 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 23/38
/waypoint addati spiral 47459 110 92820 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 24/38
/waypoint addati spiral 54276 110 93895 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 25/38
/waypoint addati spiral 61214 110 94087 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 26/38
/waypoint addati spiral 60215 110 98880 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 27/38
/waypoint addati spiral 66829 110 100591 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 28/38
/waypoint addati spiral 73596 110 105007 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 29/38
/waypoint addati spiral 76897 110 109197 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 30/38
/waypoint addati spiral 88063 110 116829 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 31/38
/waypoint addati spiral 91080 110 118019 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 32/38
/waypoint addati spiral 95674 110 125852 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 33/38
/waypoint addati spiral 101250 110 127359 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 34/38
/waypoint addati spiral 105140 110 134369 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 35/38
/waypoint addati spiral 112351 110 140887 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 36/38
/waypoint addati spiral 118799 110 148065 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 37/38
/waypoint addati spiral 127455 110 155253 false #FF0000 Translocator to Junction 38/38

Part 2A · From junction to the Archives

/waypoint addati spiral 135170 110 159150 false #FF0000 TL to Archives 1/9 (39)
/waypoint addati spiral 137610 110 156749 false #FF0000 TL to Archives 2/9 (40)
/waypoint addati spiral 143032 110 162546 false #FF0000 TL to Archives 3/9 (41)
/waypoint addati spiral 148251 110 167502 false #FF0000 TL to Archives 4/9 (42)
/waypoint addati spiral 143751 110 173975 false #FF0000 TL to Archives 5/9 (43)
/waypoint addati spiral 143453 110 177724 false #FF0000 TL to Archives 6/9 (44)
/waypoint addati spiral 150778 110 183990 false #FF0000 TL to Archives 7/9 (45)
/waypoint addati spiral 143577 110 191547 false #FF0000 TL to Archives 8/9 (46)
/waypoint addati spiral 150676 110 194399 false #FF0000 TL to Archives 9/9 (47)

Part 2B · From junction to the new Biome

/waypoint addati spiral 134879 110 159119 false #FF0000 TL to Biome 1/7 (39)
/waypoint addati spiral 130445 110 164066 false #FF0000 TL to Biome 2/7 (40)
/waypoint addati spiral 135131 110 169948 false #FF0000 TL to Biome 3/7 (41)
/waypoint addati spiral 127829 110 172568 false #FF0000 TL to Biome 4/7 (42)
/waypoint addati spiral 126800 110 179130 false #FF0000 TL to Biome 5/7 (43)
/waypoint addati spiral 125906 110 183771 false #FF0000 TL to Biome 6/7 (44)
/waypoint addati spiral 119605 110 182913 false #FF0000 TL to Biome 7/7 (45)

Part 3 · From the Biome to Nadia village

/waypoint addati spiral 123809 110 189540 false #FF0000 TL to Village 1/2 (46)
/waypoint addati spiral 129566 110 187852 false #FF0000 TL to Village 2/2 (47)

Part 4 · Final — Tobias Cave

/waypoint addati trader 126095 110 193777 false #FF8000 Tobias Cave

item.title: Useful tips
item.description:
🦌 Teleport with a deer

  1. Put all items into your deer.
  2. Call it with the flute.
  3. Immediately run:
/kill

You respawn at home, the deer teleports after you with the loot. Practice the timing first.

🏕️ Before any trip

Verify your respawn point: at home run /kill to know where Terminus will send you.
